question: With which country, the Union Cabinet approves MoU in the field of Health & Medical Science?
explanation: The Union Cabinet approved the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between India and Jordan on cooperation in the field of Health & Medical Science. Working Group will be set up to oversee the implementation of this MoU and further elaborate the details of cooperation. MoU covers, Health Research, Tobacco Control, Chronic Disease Control, National Health Statistics & Health System Government.
